introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.description: Learn how to use and navigate the guide.

installation.title: Installation
installation.description: Learn how to include the C3 Web SDK in your app.

clients.title: Clients
clients.description: Learn what a client is and how to create one.

authentication.title: Authentication
authentication.description: Learn how to register and login users, and how to authenticate them.

display-name.title: Display name
display-name.description: Learn how to change the display name of a user.

rooms.title: Rooms
rooms.description: Learn how to create a room and invite users to it.

messaging.title: Messaging
messaging.description: Learn how to send messages to users within a room.

webrtc.title: WebRTC
webrtc.description: Learn how to setup a WebRTC video call between users within a room.
